fields_of_interest: Trade, Competition, Customs, Energy, Environment, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
Main EU files followed are mobility, air pollution and climate change.  
We follow these via public sources or via information supplied by branch organisations.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
The most important branch assosiations of which Pon is a member are: 
-VNO-NCW (as part of Business Europe) 
-Rai (as part of Conebi and ACEA) 
-Bovag/VIV 
-ANWB (as part of FIA) 
-VNA 
-Fietserbond (as part of ECF/CIC) 
-BMWT 
-Scheepbouw Nederland 
-GGNL
goals__remit:
Pon is one of the largest family businesses in the Netherlands. 
Pon employs almost 13.000 people at over 450 branches across 32 countries. 
Our goal each day is to present the best offers we can to our (potential) customers. 
 
Offers bases on selling top products from the best manufacturers, and providing complementary services, such as maintenance, repair, leasing, rental and financing.  
Pon is an international trade and service company, that engages in a wide range of activities.  
The greater part of the activities is focused on import, logistics, marketing, distribution, service and maintenance of products which complement each other in terms of type, quality, and organisation.  
The products and markets are cars, commercial vehicles, trucks, busses, tires, road construction and earthmoving equipment, shipping, off-shore, transport and logistics.  
Next to the activities Pon is also a manufacturer of bicycles.
relevant_communication: Pon does not engage in the mentioned activities directly, but supports the national branch organisations
